tasks.label: Auto-Cleanup Py Cache (pycache + pytest + ruff)
args: while true; do find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete && find . -type d -name 'htmlcov' -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type d -name '.pytest_cache' -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type d -name '.ruff_cache' -exec rm -rf {} +; sleep 60; done
